text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-UNSPSC

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCodeActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCodeAn identifying data string for healthcare products.
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    UNSPSCUnited Nations Standard Products and Services Classification**Description:**United Nations Standard Products and Services Classification, managed by Uniform Code Council (UCC): www.unspsc.org

name: ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCode
title: ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCode
description: An identifying data string for healthcare products.
